p: Our results indicate that the most resilient EAPP rollout strategy corresponds to a plan optimised for a slightly wetter climate compared to historical trends. We highlight the importance of cross-border electricity trade in mitigating climate change impacts on the power system of the EAPP. Failing to climate-proof electricity infrastructure in the EAPP countries could result in fluctuations in consumer electricity prices, which might be a hindrance to economic development in the region.
